title: I Unlocked an emote on hextech crafting but it doesn't appear in my collection ?
body: As said in the title I opened some loot and it said I permanently unlocked an emote however when I go on my Emote collection it isn't there. Do I need to wait a little while or ??

replies.body:
Try relogging, if that doesn't fix it, wait a day (sometimes the emote stuff is a bit slow). If the emote still isn't there submit a support ticket :)

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
